verses.text: Woe to them that devise iniquity, and work evil upon their beds! when the morning is light, they practice it, because it is in the power of their hand.
And they covet fields, and take \add them\add* by violence; and houses, and take \add them\add* away: so they oppress a man and his house, even a man and his heritage.
Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, against this family do I devise an evil, from which ye shall not remove your necks; neither shall ye go haughtily: for this time \add is\add* evil.

In that day shall \add one\add* take up a parable against you, and lament with a grievous lamentation, \add and\add* say, We are utterly wasted: he hath changed the portion of my people: how hath he removed \add it\add* from me! turning away he hath divided our fields.
Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast a cord by lot in the congregation of the LORD.
Prophesy ye not, \add say they to them that\add* prophesy: they shall not prophesy to them, \add that\add* they shall not take shame.
O \add thou that art\add* named the house of Jacob, is the spirit of the LORD straitened? are these his doings? do not my words do good to him that walketh uprightly?
Even of late my people hath risen up as an enemy: ye pull off the robe with the garment from them that pass by securely as men averse to war.
The women of my people have ye cast out from their pleasant houses; from their children have ye taken away my glory for ever.
Arise ye, and depart; for this \add is\add* not \add your\add* rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy \add you\add* , even with a grievous destruction.
If a man walking in the spirit and falsehood doth lie, \add saying\add* , I will prophesy to thee of wine and of strong drink; he shall even be the prophet of this people.

I will surely assemble, O Jacob, all of thee; I will surely gather the remnant of Israel; I will put them together as the sheep of Bozrah, as the flock in the midst of their fold: they shall make great noise by reason of \add the multitude of\add* men.
The breaker is come up before them: they have broken up, and have passed through the gate, and have gone out by it; and their king shall pass before them, and the LORD on the head of them.
